name: Piano Hop - White Tiles Dash
description:
From Mozart to Jou Hisaishi, enjoy various genres of music with beautiful sounds of piano.

How to play:

* Touch the screen and move your finger to move the ball.
* Follow the melody and don’t miss any tile!
* That’s all, now please enjoy the addictive challenges designed for each song.

Game features:

* One touch control, easy to play.
* Update of numerous songs, Classic, Pop, New Age, ACG and all the style to satisfy different taste.
* Collect beautiful skins for your dancing balls.
* Beat your own top score and challenge your friends.
* Share your record with your friends.
* Breath-taking rhythm will challenge your hand speed limit.
* Concentrate yourself and maximize your reaction.
* Sound of high quality makes you feel like in a concert.


More rhythm music, more exciting gameplay, more challenging levels, etc.
